doc.title: Generation Meds
doc.plot: Andrew is among the ten percent of Americans who take SSRIs (a Prozac-type medication). At age 23, he is a talented musician and successful entrepreneur. But questions about the pills have been haunting him since he was prescribed Ritalin in the fifth grade. Along with Ana, his filmmaking partner, he sets out to interview people on meds and begins to implement changes that could dramatically alter his life.
